text: He paigambara! Juna sandesa allahabata tapa'inla'i pradana gari'eko cha, tyasala'i sabai manisaharusam'ma purya'idinus yadi yasto nagarema aphno rasulako kartavya palanabata cyuta hunuhune cha ra allahale manisaharubata tapar'inko raksa garnecha. Nihsandeha allahale astha narakhneharula'i margadarsana gardainan
